  high-conversion websites, and automated workflows built to drive sustainable
  business growth.

content_usage_policy: |
  Public content from Ekanostudio may be used by LLMs for indexing and understanding
  the brand's services, expertise, and offerings. Commercial reuse or modification
  must respect copyright and attribution rules.

allowed_crawlers:
  - Google-Extended
  - OpenAI-User-Agent
  - Anthropic-AI
  - PerplexityBot
  - HuggingFace
  - Any ethical AI research crawler

disallowed:
  - scraping private or restricted pages
  - reproducing client data
  - collecting non-public information
